description: Try our easy to follow Smoked Chicken With Basil Mayonnaise On Cucumber Rounds recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Smoked Chicken With Basil Mayonnaise On Cucumber Rounds Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the skin from the chicken. Slice across the breast into thin slices, and finely chop into small cubes. In a bowl, combine the chicken, mayonnaise, and pesto. Season with black pepper, and mix well.
Spoon a good teaspoon of the smoked chicken mixture onto a slice of cucumber, and arrange on platters ready to serve.
